Sentencas: To obtain detailed information on the temperature field and thermal stress field inside the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) fueled with partially pre-reformed methane.
Titulo: Effects of Methane Pre-Reforming Percentage and Flow Arrangement on the Distribution of Temperature and Thermal Stress in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: A three-dimensional geometric and mathematical model of the SOFC is implemented by using the finite element method in the commercial software COMSOL Multiphysics (R).
Titulo: Effects of Methane Pre-Reforming Percentage and Flow Arrangement on the Distribution of Temperature and Thermal Stress in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The coupling characteristics were analyzed for electrode chemical reaction, multi-component mass transfer, and heat transfer process under typical operating conditions, which was further applied for predicting and analyzing the thermal stress distribution.
Titulo: Effects of Methane Pre-Reforming Percentage and Flow Arrangement on the Distribution of Temperature and Thermal Stress in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: After model validation, parametric simulations are conducted to investigate how the methane pre-reforming percentage and flow arrangement affect the temperature and the thermal stress of SOFC.
Titulo: Effects of Methane Pre-Reforming Percentage and Flow Arrangement on the Distribution of Temperature and Thermal Stress in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The simulated results show that reducing the methane pre-reforming percentages can decrease the temperature maximum and the variation range of the first principal stress, but will increase the possibility of carbon deposition.
Titulo: Effects of Methane Pre-Reforming Percentage and Flow Arrangement on the Distribution of Temperature and Thermal Stress in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The maximum temperature of the counter-flow is about 20 K lower than that of the co-flow, and the first principal stress variation range of the counter-flow is 8.6 Mpa lower than that of the co-flow.
Titulo: Effects of Methane Pre-Reforming Percentage and Flow Arrangement on the Distribution of Temperature and Thermal Stress in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The methane pre-reforming percentages have a significant effect on the heat transfer and the thermal stress, and the counter-flow can improve the temperature uniformity and reduce the thermal stress variation range.
Titulo: Effects of Methane Pre-Reforming Percentage and Flow Arrangement on the Distribution of Temperature and Thermal Stress in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
